text: Fingers is a 1941 British drama film directed by Herbert Mason, produced by A.M.Salomon for Warner Bros and starring Clifford Evans, Leonora Corbett and Esmond Knight.BFI.org Its plot involves a London jeweller and fence for stolen goods who falls in love and tries to reform. ==Cast== * Clifford Evans - Fingers * Leonora Corbett - Bonita Grant * Esmond Knight - Sid Harris * Edward Rigby - Sam Bromley * Elizabeth Scott - Meg * Roland Culver - Hugo Allen * Reginald Purdell - Creeper * Joss Ambler - Inspector ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1941 films Category:British drama films Category:1941 drama films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Herbert Mason Category:British films Category:Films set in London Category:Films scored by Jack Beaver Category:British black-and-white films
title: Fingers (1941 film)
